text: Ezɨ Atrivim Neko kamaghɨn Josaia bagha akam amaga ghaze, “O Judan atrivim, kɨ adariba nɨn puvatɨ, egha nɨ ko mɨsoghasa izir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ tizim bagha na mɨsoghasa? God na ko ikia, egha apanibav soghasa nan avɨra, ezɨ kɨ mangɨ merara mɨsoghasa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ Godɨn anogoroghan markɨ. Puvatɨghtɨma, a nɨ gasɨghasigham.”
